foreignData.name: Sindbad der Seefahrer
foreignData.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und zeige sie offen vor. Falls es kein Land ist, wirf sie aus deiner Hand ab.

foreignData.name: Sinnbad
foreignData.text: {T}: Roba una carta y muéstrala. Si no es una carta de tierra, descártala.

foreignData.name: Sindbad
foreignData.text: {T} : Piochez une carte et révélez-la. Si ce n'est pas une carte de terrain, défaussez-vous en.

foreignData.name: Sindbad
foreignData.text: {T}: Pesca una carta e rivelala. Se non è una carta terra, scartala.

foreignData.name: シンドバッド
foreignData.text: {T}：カードを１枚引き、それを公開する。 それが土地カードでない場合、それを捨てる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間

foreignData.name: Simbá
foreignData.text: {T}: Compre um card e revele-o. Se não for um card de terreno, descarte-o.

foreignData.name: Синдбад
foreignData.text: {T}: Возьмите карту и покажите ее. Если это не земля, сбросьте ее.

foreignData.name: 辛巴达
foreignData.text: {T}：抓一张牌并展示之。 如果它不是地牌，将它弃掉。

name: Sindbad
originalText: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

rulings.text: If the draw is replaced by another effect, none of the rest of Sindbad’s ability applies, even if the draw is replaced by another draw (such as with Enduring Renewal).
To avoid confusion, reveal the card you draw before putting it with the rest of the cards in your hand.

text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.
